text: Raphael Framberger (born 6 September 1995) is a German footballer who plays as a defender for Bundesliga club FC Augsburg. ==Career statistics== Club Season League Cup Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals FC Augsburg II 2014–15 Regionalliga Bayern 19 1 — 19 1 2015–16 15 0 15 0 2016–17 2 0 2 0 2017–18 2 0 2 0 Totals 38 1 — 38 1 — FC Augsburg 2016–17 Bundesliga 3 0 0 0 3 0 2017–18 9 0 1 0 10 0 2018–19 2 0 0 0 2 0 Totals 14 0 1 0 15 0 — Career totals 52 1 1 0 53 1 — ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Augsburg players
